# Government Tender Announcement
## Request For Proposals
### Title: ITT - EW038-240060 - Paving Repairs at Grande Cache Institution, Alberta
#### Publication Date: 2023-05-07
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-06T14:00:00 (Cancellation notice is given)

The Government of Canada is implementing a Request for Proposals (RFP) process for the provision of Paving Repairs at Grande Cache Institution, located in Alberta. The Government of Canada aims to establish a contract with a successful bidder for the repair of sections of the institution's perimeter road, including radius turns and the Sally Port entrance.

### Overview

The institution is located on the western edge of Grande Cache, situated approximately 432 km northwest of Edmonton, Alberta. The proposed work will involve:

* Identifying areas of roadway that require repair
* Conducting subgrade repair
* Milling and replacing asphalt

### Eligibility Requirements

Bid Submissions are open to all qualified contractors in Canada. Interested bidders must submit proposals electronically.

## Briefing Materials

A Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available to interested bidders.

## Important Dates

* Tender Drawing Date: 2023-05-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-06T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-15
* Expected Contract End Date: None
